TcMenuPlugin.name: Control menu with rotary encoder
TcMenuPlugin.Description: Hardware rotary encoder with acceleration that needs no external components in most cases. It can either be connected direct to Arduino or on an i2c expander (8574, 23017). With long wire runs may need stronger pull up resistors near the device.

Property.name: PullUp Logic
Property.desc: Enable this to use pull up logic, otherwise pull down

Property.name: Interrupt Switches
Property.desc: Enable this to use interrupts instead of polling for switches

Property.name: IoAbstractionRef for Switches
Property.desc: This allows you to provide an IoAbstractionRef if your input is on an IO expander

Property.name: PinA of Encoder
Property.desc: The pin on which A from the encoder is connected, must be interrupt capable

Property.name: PinB of Encoder
Property.desc: The pin on which B from the encoder is connected

Property.name: PinOK of Encoder
Property.desc: The pin on which OK from the encoder is connected
